name: Pixel stories: coloring book
description:
Pixel Stories is a coloring book game based on the cartoon universe. Draw and rediscover your favorite stories by coloring in unique pictures.

Download the app and experience happiness, because coloring for relaxation is the best way to relieve stress. Try to color in all of the pictures and see what happens as a result.

If you like to draw, but you do not have any pencils or paper at hand, then this game is for you. Once a Japanese artist who was faced with a similar problem began to create digital pictures by coloring in the cells in a spreadsheet. His pixel pictures became more vivid and realistic over time, and they soon gained a wide following.

Children will also like to play this pixel coloring game. Coloring books are the best way to introduce children to the relaxing world of drawing, which also helps to develop fine motor skills. It's easy, simple, and fun.


The game contains closed pictures, which is available only with a premium subscription. Also premium subscription removes ads and gives more bonuses every day.

Premium subscription:

A subscription fee is charged to your iTunes account at the selected rate. A weekly subscription is automatically renewed every week, and a monthly subscription is renewed every month until it is canceled. However, you must cancel it no less than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. An unlimited subscription entails a one-time payment, which gives you full access to the app. You can disable auto-renewal of your subscription at any time in your iTunes account settings.

Options:

Good luck creating new masterpieces! After all, this may prove to be the beginning of a great period of creativity in your life!
